snippet.title: RiptideGP®: Renegade Console/PC Gameplay Tropico
snippet.description:
Check out the latest Gameplay footage from Riptide GP: Renegade!  There's lots of new opportunities for stunting in RGPR, including grind rails, quarter-pipes and half-pipes.  Check out the stunt-tastic shortcut on the front of the casino in this night city level.  

In Riptide GP: Renegade, armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls, outrun cops, and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.  The new game in the popular franchise brings all new tracks, vehicles, and characters, all playable in single player, split screen and online multiplayer races.

Riptide GP: Renegade is coming soon to Xbox One, PlayStation4, Windows 10, and Steam, as well as iOS, Apple TV, Android, Android TV, Kindle, and FireTV.
